body:
Hi everyone

I am working on my thesis about "kinetic facade with efficiency natural ventilation"

I finished the modeling of kinetic facade with grasshopper and now I want to start  efficiency natural ventilation analysis to find best angle of facade,s modules in every time  but I don,t know that which plugin is need to my work?? honey bee or butterfly?? or another plugin??

thank you so much





this is my facade,s algorithm

[moeinthesis.gh](http://api.ning.com:80/files/gtZdsTOdq94i3vN3hJvB3sJ7CXOujIN4JousjCEdWAC7pMV6Wq3wL0ROoayt24BnlipQpkOOiYJyayJNAnMn4T9vZMqX9w8I/moeinthesis.gh)
topic: kinetic facade with efficiency ventilation- which plugin?
